name: Match the Kana
description:
Learning the Kana? Tired of messing with flashcards? Try this simple matching game!

Choose your Kana and match the Romaji to the Kana or the Kana to the Romaji!

Early iteration, more features may come! Suggestion for future features are welcome!

Controls: Keyboard suggested

Movement: w, a, s,d or arrow keys

select: SPACEBAR
